SELECT BOARD_NUM , BOARD_NO , TITLE , MEMBER_NO , ID , BOARD_CNT , REGIST_DT , LIKE_CNT , CONTENT , MENU_TYPE , TOTAL FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS BOARD_NUM , C.* FROM ( SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.TITLE , A.MEMBER_NO , B.ID , A.BOARD_CNT , A.REGIST_DT , A.LIKE_CNT , A.CONTENT , A.MENU_TYPE , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL FROM BOARD A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO
WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.MENU_TYPE = #{menuType}
AND ( B.ID LIKE '%' || #{srchText} || '%' OR A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{srchText} || '%' OR A.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{srchText} || '%' OR A.BOARD_NO IN ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM TAG WHERE TAG_NAME LIKE #{srchText} ) )
AND B.ID LIKE '%' || #{srchText} || '%'
AND A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{srchText} || '%'
AND A.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{srchText} || '%'
AND A.BOARD_NO IN ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM TAG WHERE TAG_NAME LIKE '%' || #{srchText} || '%' )
AND A.BOARD_NO IN ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM TAG WHERE TAG_NAME = #{srchText} )
ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC ) C )
WHERE BOARD_NUM >= #{cntPerPage} * (#{nowPage} - 1) + 1 AND BOARD_NUM <= #{cntPerPage} * #{nowPage}

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.MEMBER_NO , B.ID , A.REGIST_DT , A.BOARD_CNT , A.LIKE_CNT , A.MENU_TYPE FROM BOARD A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT FILES_NO , BOARD_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , SAVE_NAME , VOLUME , PATH , DOWN_CNT FROM FILES WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND SAVE_NAME NOT LIKE 't_%' ORDER BY FILES_NO ASC
SELECT TAG_NO , TAG_NAME , BOARD_NO FROM TAG WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC, TAG_NO ASC

SELECT CASE ETC WHEN 0 THEN -1 ELSE 1 END AS UPDATE_AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT MOD(CNT, 2) AS ETC FROM ( SELECT CASE CNT WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE CNT END AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM LIKE_LOG WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} ) ) )
